World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 2 月 15 日星期四 10:19:33 GMT 120
Kites battle drones as farmers take on police during India protestsFarmers protesting in India this week are using a homemade arsenal to counter the state-of-the-art weaponry of the security forces trying to disperse them: they're flying kites to ensnare police drones carrying tear gas canisters. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 10:15:09 GMT YFMEPREXYRIMJLAHLHH6IXHE7M https://www.reuters.com/world/india/kites-battle-drones-farmers-take-police-during-india-protests-2024-02-15/Sunil Kataria世界印度
At least four killed in Ukrainian missile strike on Belgorod - Russian mediaAt least four people were killed in a Ukrainian missile attack on Russia's southern city of Belgorod, Russian media reported on Thursday, posting video from the scene. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 10:13:35 GMT E3RVSW7C6JJIVDIP4CBC43IF34 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/least-four-killed-ukrainian-missile-strike-belgorod- Russian-media-2024-02-15/Reuters世界欧洲
Ukraine sends crack brigade to town of Avdiivka as Russia closes inUkraine has rushed battle-hardened reserve fighters from its crack Third Assault Brigade to the eastern town of Avdiivka as Russia tries to capture it after months of heavy fighting. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 10:08:31 GMT D6PGHAHGHZKLXLGF7CWS3AF3ZM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-sends-crack-brigade-town-avdiivka- Russia-closes-2024-02-15/Tom Balmforth世界欧洲
Hezbollah says Israel 'will pay' after Lebanon strikes kill civiliansSenior Hezbollah official and member of parliament Hassan Fadlallah said on Thursday that Israel would face reprisal after two sets of strikes on southern Lebanon the previous day killed 10 civilians, half of them children. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 10:03:33 GMT DTKGNU3HQ5I7XGNCEKY4DMWBDQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hezbollah-says-israel-will-pay-after-lebanon-strikes-kill-civilians-2024-02-15/Reuters世界中东
Ireland to give UNRWA 20 mln euros after key donors suspend aidIreland announced 20 million euros ($21.46 million) in support for the U.N. Palestinian refugee agency (UNRWA) on Thursday and urged countries that have suspended funding to resume and expand support to the agency. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 10:02:14 GMT 5KVGW4ECTZOK5PFJATZSKVFQ7I https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/ireland-give-unrwa-20-mln-euros-after-key-donors-suspend-aid-2024-02-15/Reuters世界中东
Macron, Zelenskiy to sign bilateral security agreement on Friday - ElyseeFrance and Ukraine will sign a bilateral agreement on security commitments this Friday, the French presidency said on Thursday. Ex-Pakistan premier Imran Khan's party nominates Omar Ayub as PM candidateThe Pakistan Tehreek-Insaaf (PTI) party run by former Prime Minister Imran Khan has nominated party general secretary Omar Ayub as its candidate for prime minister, another party leader said on Thursday. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 09:26:03 GMT 2ONPF6KLFZKMFBEQDFBIZD2I24 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/ex-pakistan-premier-imran-khans-party-nominates-omar-ayub-pm-candidate-2024-02-15/Reuters世界亚太地区
Palestinian relief agency faces cash crunch unless funding resumes, chief saysThe U.N. Palestinian refugee agency (UNRWA) said on Thursday it faces a cash crunch from next month that will only get worse in April if funding suspended by a number of countries does not resume. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 09:10:36 GMT 6EY53RFHPBKBNPELSDP4MT3Y3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/palestinian-relief-agency-faces-cash-crunch-next-month-chief-says-2024-02-15/Reuters世界中东
Kremlin dismisses U.S. warning about Russian nuclear capability in spaceRussia on Thursday dismissed a warning by the United States about new Russian nuclear capabilities in space, calling it a "malicious fabrication" and a trick by the White House aimed at getting U.S. lawmakers to approve more money to counter Moscow. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 08:18:14 GMT NRA664R7SNKUFOAMPNXP4DGBXI https://www.reuters.com/world/kremlin-dismisses-us-warning-about-Russian-nuclear-capability-space-2024-02-15/Guy Faulconbridge世界
Ukraine's second city keeps going despite Russian attacksFor a city under frequent attack by Russia, Kharkiv in northeastern Ukraine is functioning surprisingly well: the streets hum with activity during the day, cafes are busy and there's even some night life. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 07:06:07 GMT SS5C2K7ZYZLGHCXZQ422WUN3E4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-second-city-keeps-going-despite- Russian-attacks-2024-02-15/Dan Peleschuk世界欧洲
Police seek clues to Kansas City mass shooting, with 3 people in custodyThree people were in custody in Kansas City, Missouri, on Thursday, facing questions about what led to a deadly mass shooting near the city's Super Bowl victory rally and who was behind it. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 06:41:48 GMT RBN26CH2NJPWZATXH6DM6BQEBQ https://www.reuters.com/world/us/police-seek-clues-kansas-city-mass-shooting-with-3-people-custody-2024-02-15/Steve Gorman, Daniel Trotta世界美国
